DOC.brief_summary: Comparison efficacy safety T2762 Vismed® treatment moderate severe Dry Eye Syndrome
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety T2762 Vismed® Dry Eye Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Signed date informed consent Male female age ≥ 18 year old . Known Dry Eye Syndrome require artificial tear within last 3 month prior study selection . Best far correct visual acuity < 1/10 Severe blepharitis Severe Dry Eye
